title: List All Transactions
description: The paginated API is used to query for multiple transactions. You can apply _filters_ through the query parameter to search for specific transactions.

page.description: The number of the page that will be returned.

limit.description: The number of resources per page.

offset.description: The number of resources to be skipped.

transform.description: The structure of response to be retrieved.

orderBy.description: The column by which the resources will be sorted.

address.description: The sender or recipient address of transaction to be retrieved.

senderId.description: The sender address of transaction to be retrieved.

senderPublicKey.description: The sender public key of transaction to be retrieved.

recipientId.description: The recipient address of transaction to be retrieved.

id.description: The id of transaction to be retrieved.

version.description: The version of transaction to be retrieved.

blockId.description: The block id of transaction to be retrieved.

sequence.description: The sequence of transaction to be retrieved.

sequence.from.description: The minimum sequence of transaction to be retrieved.

sequence.to.description: The maximum sequence of transaction to be retrieved.

timestamp.description: The timestamp of transaction to be retrieved.

timestamp.from.description: The minimum timestamp of transaction to be retrieved.

timestamp.to.description: The maximum timestamp of transaction to be retrieved.

nonce.description: The nonce of transaction to be retrieved.

nonce.from.description: The minimum nonce of transaction to be retrieved.

nonce.to.description: The maximum nonce of transaction to be retrieved.

type.description: The type of transaction to be retrieved.

typeGroup.description: The typeGroup of transaction to be retrieved.

vendorField.description: The vendorField of transaction to be retrieved.

amount.description: The amount of transaction to be retrieved.

amount.from.description: The minimum amount of transaction to be retrieved.

amount.to.description: The maximum amount of transaction to be retrieved.

fee.description: The fee of transaction to be retrieved.

fee.from.description: The minimum fee of transaction to be retrieved.

fee.to.description: The maximum fee of transaction to be retrieved.

asset.description: The asset of transaction to be retrieved.
